column4: hey, i have no sound at all, is there a good place to start figuring aout why?
but first go to the sound control and make sure PCM is up
do you mean sound preferences?
yep
where sould the PCM be up, under which category?
sorry, you went to the panel and right clicked on the volume control there right? It will open a window with a bunch of sliders one of those is labeled with PCM
yes, pcm is on
and to full?
how would i know if my sound card is detected?
oh I thought it was working before?
ah okay, do you know what sound card you have?
okay, I presumed you connected your sound card to your motherboard?
or by another method?
its connected to the sound card in the pci slot
okay, pastebin the output of lspci please
lspci
that is a creative x-fi, support for it is extremely patchy
really all i want is stereo any help there?
I am looking around for you know :)
but I wouldn't hold your breath
can you follow these instructions so we know exactly which card you have http://support.creative.com/kb/showarticle.aspx?sid=6843
you may want to join #creative on this server, the people there are great and should be able to help you out more
also see http://connect.creativelabs.com/opensource/default.aspx
